translations.client.settings.ejectKey.desc: The key used to uninject the client
translations.client.settings.menuBlurEnabled.desc: Whether blur is enabled or disabled for the menu
translations.client.settings.useDX11.desc:
Causes an FPS boost for some systems and may degrade performance for more high-end systems: but may cause issues.
Restart your game upon disabling this setting.
translations.client.settings.forceDisableVSync.desc:
Forces VSync in fullscreen. May cause freezing, overheating, and screen tearing on some devices.
Restart your game upon changing this setting.
translations.client.settings.menuIntensity.desc: The intensity of the menu blur
translations.client.settings.minecraftRenderer.desc: Use the Minecraft renderer for all HUD modules.
translations.client.settings.textShadow.desc: Whether to have text shadows or not with Minecraft renderer.
translations.client.settings.secondaryFont.desc: HUD Font when using non-minecraft renderer
translations.client.settings.centerCursor.desc: Crosshair will be centered when you open the menu.
translations.client.settings.snapLines.desc: Snap lines to help you align modules
translations.client.settings.detectLanguage.name: Detect language
translations.client.settings.detectLanguage.desc: Automatically switch Latite Client's language based off of the system language.
translations.client.settings.mcRendererFont.default.d: The default UI font (Mojangles by default)
translations.client.settings.dx11EnabledMsg.name: &7Please restart your game to use DX12 again!

The number of decimals in the reach number

translations.client.textmodule.breakIndicator.desc: Shows the break progress of the block you're breaking.

Shows a visual progress bar instead of text.

translations.client.textmodule.breakIndicator.rad.des: The corner radius of the progress bar.
translations.client.textmodule.breakIndicator.padding: The padding of the progress bar.

translations.client.textmodule.speedDisplay.desc: Displays your speed in blocks (meters) per second.
The number of decimals to show
Include Y motion in the speed value

translations.client.textmodule.toggleSprintSneak.desc: Toggle sprinting or sneaking without holding the button.
translations.client.textmodule.toggleSprintSneak.labe: Whether to show the label or not
translations.client.textmodule.toggleSprintSneak.alwa: Always Sprint even if sprinting is not toggled

translations.client.module.blockGame.arrSetting.desc: Automatic Repeat Rate: the speed at which tetrominoes move when holding down movement keys, measured in frames per movement.
translations.client.module.blockGame.dasSetting.desc: Delayed Auto Shift: the time between the initial keypress and the start of its automatic repeat movement, measured in frames.
translations.client.module.blockGame.dcdSetting.desc: DAS Cut Delay: if not 0, any ongoing DAS movement will pause for a set amount of time after dropping/rotating a piece, measured in frames.
translations.client.module.blockGame.sdfSetting.desc: Soft Drop Factor: the factor with which soft drops change the gravity speed (scales with current level)
translations.client.module.blockGame.audioSetting.des: Whether audio should be enabled or not

translations.client.module.blockGame.drawGhostPiece.d: Whether an indicator of where a piece will be placed should be shown on the board or not
